ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 71
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nope.  I m on the 6-month subscription plan. :)  If I get my ogre to 50th level and want to start a new char.. you bet I ll twink him a little.  The most
ygData.messageBody:
> ahhh and the twinkers respond. You know what...just keep twinking
> away...eventually you will get bored with the game and leave.
> Actually...i think I will just move to Tallon Zek servers. That way I can
> take care of twinkers...one twink at a time.

Nope. I'm on the 6-month subscription plan. :) If I get my ogre to 50th
level and want to start a new char.. you bet I'll twink him a little. The
most boring levels of the game are the "builder" levels. The ones you're
stuck in a little area, and can't go anywhere else because 95% of everything
will KoS you in 1 attack. If I can give my char a little edge to get
through these levels faster, to get him into good enough shape to ADVENTURE,
I will.

> The kindergarden mentality on the normal servers of "i can do what i want
> and you can't do anything about it" sickens me. Damn I wish every server
> was PvP....no twinkers....and the only assholes would be the ones who can
> defend themselves.

PvP does not make the game enjoyable for me. I'm in it to look around,
adventure. Not have to deal with people wanting to kill me if I happen to
get something cool for my chars. And, the "race war" server is a good
idea.. bad implementation. I'll never use it in its current form. But, I'm
not gonna say I'm better than people who DO use it. I play the game my way,
and I really don't care how anyone else does it (unless they're actually
hacking the game, a la Diablo.)

Just my 150 cents CDN (2 cents American.)
